name: Minyans of Irie
description:
My name is Andres and I’m thrilled to introduce the first release from my tiny indie ‘studio’ – Minyans of Irie! 

Minyans of Irie is a single player game that blends a light base building/simulation mode with top-down shoot n slash mayhem and RPG elements all in a sweet pixel package. It is offline and **free to play** with light ads which can be removed forever for a one-time $0.99 purchase. 

  • Check out our sweet n cheesy Youtube teaser!

It is out now for Android 

  • Get the game from the Google Play Store

We will be releasing on iOS in early September! 

  • Follow AND Studios on Twitter to get updates for iOS!

We made a simple website for the game too if you’re interested in learning more:

  •  www.andstudios.nyc/minyans

And gifs!

  • Accidents Happen
  • Stay Back!
  • Fear the KrakaBoa

AND Studios is just one guy (me). I did everything for the game at first – then I realized I wasn’t very good at art or building out a world so I got some help from very talented people! We all thank you so much for taking the time to check it out!
